name: Luzianne Specially Blended Iced Tea, 12 oz

reviews.name: Luzianne Specially Blended Iced Tea, 12 oz
reviews.reviewText: Love this tea! Much better than other popular brands. This tea will never become cloudy after brewing. Stays clear and tastes great.
reviews.title: 29 June 2011

reviews.name: Luzianne Specially Blended Iced Tea, 12 oz
reviews.reviewText:
I love this tea, never had it before, until I had some at my daughters house. She is a military wife and she had it when she lived in Mississippi. I had a hard time finding it. Finally I found it online at Walmart.

The only thing that disappointed me was I could only order 1, and it took forever to get it. However I did find it, at another local Walmart, where I can buy it myself instead of online.

It is an excellent tea.
reviews.title: great tea

reviews.name: Luzianne Specially Blended Iced Tea, 12 oz
reviews.reviewText: All the basic teas for making ice tea, taste just about the same to me. Some times ice tea can have a merky look to it and also some times a musky taste. I must say that I prefer Luzianne tea and Walmart brand tea's for ice tea over any other. In addition, I love that Luzianne tea does not waste paper wrapping their tea bags. I always remove the tea bags from the package and place in a jar. I think most people these days store their tea bags in a jar or canister. I do like the family size tea bags best because I make pitchers of tea, not cups.
reviews.title: One of my favs for making ice tea

reviews.name: Luzianne Specially Blended Iced Tea, 12 oz
reviews.reviewText: this is the first time i bought luzianne..........and taste great
reviews.title: love it

reviews.name: Luzianne Specially Blended Iced Tea, 12 oz
reviews.reviewText: I love this tea never bitter, it is a great value. one box provides my beverages for the month!
reviews.title: Quality tea reasonable price
